name: Soul Reflection
description:
Soul Reflection was designed during a month long 2018 IGMC Game Jam. This game is about knowing who you are. The game is  designed to challenge your sense of perception and memory. In this  Adventure you play as both hero's Sion and Ryin as they are chosen to take part in the ultimate challenge this undertaking is to know there own Soul Reflection. To do this they must absorb enough  Essence found in what is called the Trial Mazes.  Be warned though for the ever changing keepers of confusion are  weaving and warping there deception around you constantly they will not rest until your so lost of who you are, you  no longer can sense your own reflection anymore.

Demo  Designed By - Tony Burgess
